title: T202 Wheat Strikes Out for sale

posts.post_title: T202 Wheat Strikes Out for sale
posts.post_content:
$225.00 delivered. Check or money order only. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations, requests for information, etc. Correspondence by email at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my updated website. Thank you for looking.

[IMG]https://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t202whe54.jpg[/IMG]
Please let me know if you can view it. [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] Thanks to everyone for their patience.
